title: (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (Section 31) (Competition and Consumer
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Civil Law and Criminal Law
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Civil Law and Criminal Law 
(Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (Section 31) (Competition and Consumer 
Protection Commission) (Designation) Order 2020. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 15th October 2020.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited civil law criminal law (miscellaneous provisions) act 2020 (section 31) (competition consumer protection commission) (designation) order 2020 (2) order come operation 15th october 2020

title: (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (Section 31) (Competition and Consumer
heading: 2. The Competition and Consumer Protection Commission, in respect of its
text_raw:
2. The Competition and Consumer Protection Commission, in respect of its 
holding of hearings under section 20(1)(a)(ii) of the Competition Act 2002 (No. 
14 of 2002), and for the purposes of section 31 of the Civil Law and Criminal 
Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 13 of 2020), is designated and 
may hold such hearings before it by remote hearing. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

15 October, 2020. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Minister for Business, Enterprise and Innovation. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 23rd October, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [455] 3
